page.title: 06Itchenor Sailing Club
page.content: The Itchenor Sailing Club was founded in 1927 by visiting Londoners and to this day the majority of members are from the London area. The Club has about 1200 active members restricted to those sailing the nine different classes of craft. The Club owns the freehold of the Clubhouse and its grounds and all the members share in is maintenance. There is racing every weekend for the various classes of craft. There is an Annual Regatta and two weeks racing for Junior members during August.
